Tavatron snarled softly, this feeling of uneasiness just wouldn't go 
away. This was all too easy. Tavatron's ears swiveled in Dinobot's 
direction as he appraoched her. She listened as he spoke. Could it 
be? Was there actually concern in his voice? He really was worried 
about her. That was kinda... nice. It felt good to have someone 
like him watching her back. 

Tavatron almost tripped over her own feet when when he told her what 
exactly he wanted to do. Carry her?! That was a little extreme. She 
could run, perhaps not as fast as she usually does, but fast enough. 
She was about to tell him that she would do fine on her own when 
suddenly Prowl tossed the 'detonator' to the six 'bot's behind them. 
After a few moments of confusion the device was caught, and the ruse 
was over. Tavatron turned back to Dinobot as the Alliance moved 
forward, intent on destroying them:

"Alright, you can carry me! Let's just get out of here!"

Tavatron then aknowledged the com from Iron Raptor:

"We're coming!"
